title: United, Delta Cancel Some Flights as Omicron Spreads
sub_head: Airlines have said they expect holiday travel this week and next to be among the busiest since before the pandemic
body:
United Airlines Holdings Inc. is canceling dozens of flights over the holiday weekend as a surge of Covid-19 cases affects crews, and Delta Air Lines Inc. also cited the variant as a factor behind a number of cancellations.
At both airlines, the cancellations account for a relatively small share of planned flying.
